label.name: unlabeled
label.description: all points with no special label.

label.name: sidewalk
label.description: Areas used mainly by pedestrians, bicycles, but not meant for driving.

label.name: terrain
label.description: grass and all other types of horizontal spreading vegetation, including soil.

label.name: other-ground
label.description: Other areas that are not used by pedestrians or meant for driving.

label.name: person
label.description: Persons moving by their own legs, sitting, or any unusual pose, but not meant to drive a vehicle.

label.name: bicyclist
label.description: Humans driving a bicycle or without bicycle.

label.name: car
label.description: This includes cars, jeeps, SUVs, vans with a continuous body shape (i.e. the driver cabin and cargo compartment are one)

label.name: bus
label.description: Includes buses that are intended for 9+ persons for public or long-distance transport.

label.name: truck
label.description: This includes trucks, vans with a body that is separate from the driver cabin, pickup trucks, as well as their attached trailers.

label.name: other-object
label.description: other small/convex objects on the street, where we now have not a specific label.

label.name: pole
label.description: thin and elongated, typically vertically oriented poles, eg. sing or traffic signs.

label.name: fence
label.description: fences, small walls, crash barriers, etc.

label.name: vegetation
label.description: Trees, and other forms of vertical growing vegetation.
